body.p:
Edmonton Ky
March 21st. 1862
To his Excellency,
B Magoffin,
Sir.

I would respectfully represent to your Excellency that Jno. W Bowling a commissioned justice of the peace of Metcalfe County, has left the County of his residence and has gone to the Confederate States, without any probability of his ever returning; I therefore recommend that you appoint and Commission "John Sutton" as a justice of the peace in place of said Bowling in district No. 2. Metcalfe County Ky,

Yours Respectfully
Jno. Y Wallace
Presiding Judge Metcalfe Co.

Metcalfe Co
J. P.
Dist. No. 2.
Jno Sutton
Com Issd
Mar 31. 1862
